42  abstract public function showSimpleMessage($content, $type, $title = null, $icon = "info", $timeout = NULL, $staticName = null): HtmlMessage;

44  public function createController($force = null) {
45  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
46  $this->_createController ( $_POST ["name"], [ "%baseClass%" => "ControllerBase" ], 'controller.tpl', isset ( $_POST ["lbl-ck-div-name"] ) );
47  }
48  $this->controllers ();
49  }
50 
51  public function _createView() {
52  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
53  $action = $_POST ["action"];
54  $controller = $_POST ["controller"];
55  $controllerFullname = $_POST ["controllerFullname"];
56  $viewName = $controller . "/" . $action . ".html";
57  $this->_createViewOp ( $controller, $action );
58  if (\file_exists ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $viewName )) {
59  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#msgControllers").transition("show");$("#msgControllers .content").transition("show").append("<br><b>' . $viewName . '</b> created !");', true );
60  }
61  $r = new \ReflectionMethod ( $controllerFullname, $action );
62  $lines = file ( $r->getFileName () );
63  $views = $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getActionViews ( $controllerFullname, $controller, $action, $r, $lines );
64  foreach ( $views as $view ) {
65  echo $view->compile ( $this->jquery );
66  echo "&nbsp;";
67  }
68  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
69  }
70  }
71 
72  private function _createViewOp($controller, $action) {
73  $viewName = $controller . "/" . $action . ".html";
74  UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $controller );
75  $frameworkDir = Startup::getFrameworkDir ();
76  UFileSystem::openReplaceWriteFromTemplateFile ( $frameworkDir . "/admin/templates/view.tpl", \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $viewName, [ "%controllerName%" => $controller,"%actionName%" => $action ] );
77  return $viewName;
78  }
79 
80  public function _newActionFrm() {
81  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
82  $controllers = CacheManager::getControllers ();
83  $controller = $_POST ["controller"];
84  $modal = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlModal ( "modalNewAction", "Creating a new action in controller" );
85  $modal->setInverted ();
86  $frm = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlForm ( "frmNewAction" );
87  $dd = $frm->addDropdown ( 'controller', \array_combine ( $controllers, $controllers ), "Controller", $controller );
88  $dd->getField ()->setShowOnFocus ( false );
89  $fields = $frm->addFields ( [ "action","parameters" ], "Action & parameters" );
90  $fields->getItem ( 0 )->addRules ( [ "empty",[ "checkAction","Action {value} already exists!" ] ] );
91  $frm->addTextarea ( "content", "Implementation" )->addRule ( [ "checkContent","Errors parsing action content!" ] );
92  ;
93  $frm->addCheckbox ( "ck-view", "Create associated view" );
94  $frm->addCheckbox ( "ck-add-route", "Add route..." );
95 
96  $frm->addContent ( "<div id='div-new-route' style='display: none;'>" );
97  $frm->addDivider ();
98  $fields = $frm->addFields ();
99  $fields->addInput ( "path", "", "text", "" )->addRule ( [ "checkRoute","Route {value} already exists!" ] );
100  $fields->addDropdown ( "methods", Constants::REQUEST_METHODS, null, "", true );
101  $duration = $fields->addInput ( "duration", "", "number" );
102  $ck = $duration->labeledCheckbox ( "left", null );
103  $ck->getField ()->setProperty ( "name", "ck-Cache" );
104  $frm->addContent ( "</div>" );
105 
106  $frm->setValidationParams ( [ "on" => "blur","inline" => true ] );
107  $frm->setSubmitParams ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_newAction", "#messages" );
108  $modal->setContent ( $frm );
109  $modal->addAction ( "Validate" );
110  $this->jquery->click ( "#action-modalNewAction-0", "$('#frmNewAction').form('submit');", false, false );
111  $modal->addAction ( "Close" );
112  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('.dimmer.modals.page').html('');$('#modalNewAction').modal('show');", true );
113  $this->jquery->jsonOn ( "change", "#ck-add-route", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_addRouteWithNewAction", "post", [ "context" => "$('#frmNewAction')","params" => "$('#frmNewAction').serialize()","jsCondition" => "$('#ck-add-route').is(':checked')" ] );
114  $this->jquery->exec ( Rule::ajax ( $this->jquery, "checkAction", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_methodExists", "{}", "result=data.result;", "postForm", [ "form" => "frmNewAction" ] ), true );
115  $this->jquery->exec ( Rule::ajax ( $this->jquery, "checkContent", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_checkContent", "{}", "result=data.result;", "postForm", [ "form" => "frmNewAction" ] ), true );
116  $this->jquery->exec ( Rule::ajax ( $this->jquery, "checkRoute", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_checkRoute", "{}", "result=data.result;", "postForm", [ "form" => "frmNewAction" ] ), true );
117  $this->jquery->change ( "#ck-add-route", "$('#div-new-route').toggle($(this).is(':checked'));" );
118  echo $modal;
119  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
120  }
121  }
122 
123  public function _controllerExists($fieldname) {
124  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
125  $result = [ ];
126  header ( 'Content-type: application/json' );
127  $controller = ucfirst ( $_POST [$fieldname] );
128  $controllerNS = Startup::getNS ( "controllers" );
129  $result ["result"] = ! class_exists ( $controllerNS . $controller );
130  echo json_encode ( $result );
131  }
132  }
133 
134  public function _methodExists() {
135  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
136  $result = [ ];
137  header ( 'Content-type: application/json' );
138  $controller = $_POST ["controller"];
139  $action = $_POST ["action"];
140  if (\method_exists ( $controller, $action )) {
141  $result ["result"] = false;
142  } else {
143  $result ["result"] = true;
144  }
145  echo json_encode ( $result );
146  }
147  }
148 
149  public function _checkContent() {
150  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
151  $result = [ ];
152  header ( 'Content-type: application/json' );
153  $content = $_POST ["content"];
154  $result ["result"] = CodeUtils::isValidCode ( '<?php ' . $content );
155  echo json_encode ( $result );
156  }
157  }
158 
159  public function _checkRoute() {
160  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
161  $result = [ ];
162  header ( 'Content-type: application/json' );
163  if (isset ( $_POST ["path"] ) && $_POST ["path"] != null) {
164  $path = $_POST ["path"];
165  $routes = CacheManager::getRoutes ();
166  $result ["result"] = ! (isset ( $routes [$path] ) || Router::getRouteInfo ( $path ) !== false);
167  } else {
168  $result ["result"] = true;
169  }
170  echo json_encode ( $result );
171  }
172  }
173 
174  public function _addRouteWithNewAction() {
175  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
176  $result = [ ];
177  header ( 'Content-type: application/json' );
178 
179  $controller = $_POST ["controller"];
180  $action = $_POST ["action"];
181  $parameters = $_POST ["parameters"];
182  $parameters = CodeUtils::getParametersForRoute ( $parameters );
183  $controller = ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $controller );
184 
185  $urlParts = \array_diff ( \array_merge ( [ $controller,$action ], $parameters ), [ "","{}" ] );
186  $result ["path"] = \implode ( '/', $urlParts );
187  echo json_encode ( $result );
188  }
189  }
190 
191  public function _newAction() {
192  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
193  $routeInfo = null;
194  if (isset ( $_POST ["ck-add-route"] ) && isset ( $_POST ["path"] )) {
195  $routeInfo = [ "path" => $_POST ["path"],"methods" => $_POST ["methods"],"ck-Cache" => $_POST ["ck-Cache"] ?? null,"duration" => $_POST ["duration"] ];
196  }
197  $this->scaffold->_newAction ( $_POST ["controller"], $_POST ["action"], $_POST ["parameters"], $_POST ["content"], $routeInfo, isset ( $_POST ["ck-view"] ) );
198  }
199  $this->jquery->get ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_refreshControllers/refresh", "#dtControllers", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => false,"dataType" => "html" ] );
200  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
201  }
202 
203  public function _refreshCacheControllers() {
204  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
205  \ob_start ();
206  CacheManager::initCache ( $config, "controllers" );
207  $message = \ob_get_clean ();
208  echo $this->showSimpleMessage ( \nl2br ( $message ), "info", "info", 4000 );
209  $this->jquery->get ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_refreshControllers/refresh", "#dtControllers", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => false,"dataType" => "html" ] );
210  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
211  }
212 
213  public function frmFilterControllers() {
214  $controllers = CacheManager::getControllers ();
215  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getFilterControllers ( $controllers );
216  $this->jquery->postFormOn ( "click", "#validate-btn", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/filterControllers", "filtering-frm", "#dtControllers", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => false,"jsCallback" => '$("#frm").html("");' ] );
217  $this->jquery->execOn ( "click", "#cancel-btn", '$("#frm").html("");' );
218  $this->jquery->renderView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewControllersFiltering () );
219  }
220 
221  public function filterControllers() {
222  USession::set ( "filtered-controllers", URequest::post ( "filtered-controllers", [ ] ) );
223  $this->_refreshControllers ( "refresh" );
224  }
225 }
